attributes.action: Please prohibit cyclist to ride on main street where cycle lane is available.
attributes.additional_details: Only government has the power to implement and execute a law properly.
attributes.background: Driving in London is becoming more dangerous for everyone nowadays. Motorbike and cycle is high in numbers mostly working on delivery platforms. Riding bicycle on the main street where well-built bicycle Highway available should be prohibited to mitigate the situation.

rejection.details: It is already an offence to cycle on a footway, unless the relevant traffic authority has permitted the use of cycles on the footway. Taking enforcement action is a matter for the relevant local authority and police force.
